verbose_text: MTX causes a decrease in intracellular NADPH by inhibiting cytosolic nicotinamide adenine phosphate dehydrogenase (NADPDH) and NADP dependent malic enzyme; NADPH is required for the glutathione reductase (GSSG-R) enzyme, which provides continuity of reduced glutathione-a cytosolic antioxidant.
evidence: MTX causes a decrease in intracellular NADPH by inhibiting cytosolic nicotinamide adenine
